value.title: Create stunning reports with less effort with this setting!
value.excerpt: How can you with no effort besides the original set up, create stunning reports every single time? In this tutorial, i will show you how to set up a custom background for every new page automatically, so you reports wont look dull and white and will stand out among the crowds. The performance of EARLIER might be slow because it theoretically, it might have to perform a number of operations
